content.description: Sit start the right side, move up to a left hand sloper on the lip, then get a right hand crimp, make hard move to a left edge, and top out.
content.location: At the beginning of the pileline trail/road, go 50-75 feet uphill and this block is on your right.

content.description: Sit start using the rock pedestal, and power up this burly problem.
content.location: This problem is at the beginning of the pipeline and is roughly about a minute behind the storage facility in a small alcove near a stonewall.

content.description: Sit start the left face. It is cool.
content.location: This is on the face that faces the trail....

content.description: Follow the flake mid-way up the face, then move up and over the thin edge on the upper right corner of the face.
content.location: This is on the same boulder as Accept the Challenge and Pick Your Nose.

content.description: Follow the flake up the face to the left.
content.location: This is on the back side of the boulder on top of the "Megadeath Hill" on the pipeline. Go left at the pipeline forest lane junction and take your first right. Don't go more than 100 yards off the top of the hill. It is on the same boulder as Accept the Challenge and Pick Your Nose.

content.description: Stand start the bullet hard, left, rounded arête/face, move up, and top out.
content.location: This problem is located about halfway down the pipeline on the left side of the trail. The boulder sits back about 30 feet from the trail. This problem faces the pipeline.

content.description: Sit start with a solid right hand on the arete and left on a crimp. The pedestal rock is off for the feet. Pull up and send the arete to the top. The crux is getting off the ground.
content.location: This is on the boulder on top of the "Megadeath" Hill, the hill to the right of forest lane/pipeline interecting. It is the same boulder that Accept the Challenge is on.

content.description: Squat start on two shallow slopers. Fire to the lip, and move up to gain the top.
content.location: This is located between Gung Ho arete and Culturally Diverse.

content.description: Sit start the arete on the backside to a slopey topout.
content.location: It is about halfway down the pipeline on the left side of the trail.

content.description: Sit start the right fac,e and move up to the left-trending slopey arête. Traverse left to the peak, and top out. This route gets one star based upon the fragile flakes located at the start.
content.location: With your back to the storage facility, walk about 2-3 minutes down the pipeline, and look left to find this block about 40 feet off the trail.

content.description: Stand start the steep right side of the boulder a few feet left of the tree.
content.location: This is about 6 feet left of the problem Gung Ho Arete.

content.description: Sit start and climb up the steep egg.
content.location: This is on the right about 50 feet in the woods just before the pipeline crosses the road.

content.description: Sit start the sheer, cylinder arete on the right side of the boulder that faces the trail. Powerful.
content.location: After crossing the main road, continue uphill, take the first significant trail on your right, and walk less than a minute to find this block on the right side of the trail.

content.description: There are about 8-10 boulders along the pipeline.
